title: Fiskars 1541301001 Non-Stick Titanium Softgrip Scissors, 8" Length, 3 1/10" Cut
description: Great for all-purpose cutting in the office or the home, these versatile scissors feature non-stick, titanium-enhanced stainless-steel blades that cut cleanly through materials with sticky adhesives and stay sharp through heavy use. A lightweight design and ergonomically sculpted handle provide excellent cutting control, and Softgrip helps reduce hand fatigue.
